Joomladay Italy & Nooku Demo Day

02 November 2009 by Johan

The Nooku Team will be at the Joomladay Italy on November 21st in Rome to talk about DOCman 1.5 and it’s future. But we have much more to talk about: Together with Beyounic, we are organizing a Nooku Demo Day in Rome on November 20th. The event will be mainly focussed on the [Nooku Framework][1].

This is your chance to learn all about this exciting new framework from Nooku Lead Architects Johan Janssens and Mathias Verraes. The primary language will be English but the Beyounic Team will facilitate the communication, providing unplugged translation to and from Italian.

The event takes place from 13:30 until 18:00 and the registration fee is 15 euro to cover our costs. We have only 50 seats available, so register fast!

Topics include:

  • Why is there a need for a new framework for Joomla development?
  • How Nooku helps you to write less code
  • Getting started with Nooku Framework for your next project
  • Taking a look upcoming Joomla extensions built on Nooku Framework : Anahita, Ninjaboard, Nooku Content, …
  • Q&A

Details

Location:

    Aran Park Hotel - Via Riccardo Forster, 24 – 00143 – Roma, Italia

Date:

    Friday November 20th, 2009

Schedule:

    13h30 Welcome, 14h00 Start of the event, 18h00 End.

Price:

    15 euro, to be paid at the door

Language:

    English, Italian

Registration:
